actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to permit any surviving spouse of a person interred in a post cemetery or the post section of a national cemetery to be interred in such cemetery.

summary.text: Provides that the surviving spouse of any person buried in a post cemetery, or the post section of a national cemetery, may be buried in such person's gravesite or an adjoining gravesite.

titles.title: A bill to permit any surviving spouse of a person interred in a post cemetery or the post section of a national cemetery to be interred in such cemetery.
